author: marvin
msg: Wrap the entire web page template using a div with a fixed width of 1060
pixels.  This hack is justified because the current fluid layout used by the
main Apache site (which we cloned) is a little sloppy.  It's possible to get
elements lined up under a fixed width; it would be much harder to fix things
so they start staying aligned under the fluid layout.

author: marvin
msg: Insert some whitespace and div-labeling comments to make template structure clearer.

author: bpendleton
msg: DERBY-4443: Wrap rollback in exception handlers in try-catch
This patch was contributed by Houx Zhang (houxzhang at gmail dot com)
The patch modifies the error handling in SystemProcedures.java so that
secondary exceptions during rollback are chained to the primary exception.
Also, EmbedSQLException's wrapping behavior is adjusted so that the
StandardException logic doesn't try to unwrap the chained exceptions.
A new test is added to the tools suite; it simulates rollback errors
using a special mock driver and mock connection, and verifies that
